apiResult.english: We are taught never to shed tears. For to shed tears means that the body has been defeated by emotion. And, to us, that simple act of crying proves, without question, that the existence of emotion is nothing but a burden.
apiResult.indo: Kita diajarkan untuk tidak pernah meneteskan air mata. Karena meneteskan air mata berarti tubuh telah dikalahkan oleh emosi. Dan, bagi kami, tangisan sederhana itu membuktikan, tanpa pertanyaan, bahwa keberadaan emosi hanyalah sebuah beban.
